https://github.com/pond3r/ggpo/commit/7ddadef8546a7d99ff0b3530c6056bc8ee4b9c0a

Changes:
* add_common_flags() removed from /src/CMakeLists.txt. GGPO should build with the same flags as other projects.
* project() call moved from /CMakeLists.txt to /src/CMakeLists.txt
* Unneeded files removed
* Files from /src moved to /
